The Quran tells Muslims to:
 
 kill unbelievers wherever they find them (Q.2:191),
 Murder them and treat them harshly (Q.9:123),
 Fight them, (Q.8:65), until no other religion than Islam is left (Q.2:193)
 Humiliate them and impose on them a penalty tax if they are Christians or Jews, (Q.9:29)
 Slay them if they are Pagans (Q.9:5), 
 crucify, or cut off their hands and feet,
 A Muslim apostate must be killed.(Q 9:12)
 
 It's a perfect murdering machine.

I thought a religion of murder would be attractive to you VT, aren't you big on murdering innocent people? Support nuking hiroshima, nagasaki? The vietnam war? The Iraq war?

You aren't prepared to state it openly, because even you realise how pathetic that argument is, so you just hint at it. Do us all a favour and come back when you are prepared to be honest about what you are trying to say.

 This is just silly. Killing OTHER PEOPLE is acceptable and an entertaining hobby. OTHER PEOPLE trying to kill US is NOT acceptable.

The greatest power any religion has is in its ability to raise man above men. The followers are led by a being far greater than man. The ceremonies and fasting shared by all faiths enforce this concept to the point where man can look at men outside the Religion as something other than the animal to which they are.
 
 Remember, no religion on the earth has received a message from God that gave man any kind of useful knowledge, like wash your hands or something. It's always been law and blind obedience that must be followed by faith alone. Think about that; all laws have been around longer than any religion. So we are given what we already have (law) and no useful knowledge like maybe how to make a band aid. 
 
 The Damned; the Unbelievers; Gentles, Infidels and the Lost of the planet cause God to do judgment. You can not eat with them or be near them. They are demons that lead you away from the light After all; they have given themselves to fruits of this world and live in depravity and horror.
 
 Surely God wants a religious nation. He wants you to worship him. Its always good work to convert, destroy the other animals (mankind) by logic alone. Who wants God to judge their nation, they live there.
 
 All Religions fall into this trap. They all have their witches to burn and Nations to overcome by help of a God. Funny thing; A snake can kill, it don't take a very advanced mind. Ever wonder why God needs so much help killing? Every faith has God asking for just that. All of them.
Funny, I have never heard God requiring me to kill anyone. I have on the other hand heard of lots of people CLAIMING God told them to kill other people

nothing like selective quoting. I can't be bothered going through all those quotes, but take the first one shall we?
 2:190
 Fight in the cause of Allah those who fight you, but do not transgress limits; for Allah loveth not transgressors. 
 2:191
 And slay them wherever ye catch them, and turn them out from where they have Turned you out; for tumult and oppression are worse than slaughter; but fight them not at the Sacred Mosque, unless they (first) fight you there; but if they fight you, slay them. Such is the reward of those who suppress faith. 
 
 So we have an invocation to fight in self-defence only, in response to oppression. That's really the same as killing all unbelievers. ;)

 What you are forgetting or more likely considering with hindsight after 2000 years is that AT THE TIME in the annals of the countries at that time what happened was a totally insignificant event. What it grew to happened later.
 
 In modern terms would you expect people to excitedly report on the average street assault and punishment for more than a day. Most of these last about one day in print. In those days there weren't any newpapers nor TV so events must be remarkable AT THE TIME to generate that level of interest. I submit that AT THAT TIME what happened was to the rulers trivial
